product_name: Quiksilver Front Zip Paddle Jacket - Men's
long_description: Paddle for just a bit longer in the balanced warmth of the Quiksilver Front Zip paddle jacket. Smooth polyurethane, polyester and spandex fabric offers insulation, and resists spray and splashes. Polypropylene lining feels soft against skin, wicks moisture and enhances warmth. Full-length zipper makes it easy to put on the jacket at a moment's notice. Stretchy fabric panels enhance range of movement when paddling. Rear envelope-style pocket stores extras, and earphone cord port lets you bring along the tunes. Flatlock stitching reduces chafing. Hand wash the Quiksilver Front Zip paddle jacket and line dry.
short_description: Paddle for just a bit longer in the balanced warmth of the Quiksilver Front Zip paddle jacket.
